title: A1398 820-3332-A GPU
message:
Hi,

Is it possible to disable GPU in an A1398 820-3332-A? The hardware mod is the same of the 820-3071-A?
If so, can i remove R8810 to disable power to GPU?

title: A1398 820-3332-A GPU
message:
This board accepts the easiest way to disable GPU.
Always disable GPU power supply for such conversion; removing R8900/01, in this case.

title: A1398 820-3332-A GPU
message: Sorry... what is the best way to remove VCC of VGA from L8960 and L8930? I'm not seeing it

title: A1398 820-3332-A GPU
message:
"removing R8900/01, in this case."
This is good enough, to disable the GPU power supply.

If you like, remove Q8930/31/61 and U8900; may reuse them.
